Title: Relates to establishing a municipality's liability for negligence when any contact is made by anyone on behalf of an injured party to a municipal representative
Summary: Relates to establishing a municipality's liability for negligence when any contact is made by anyone on behalf of an injured party to a municipal representative.
LawCode: Add ยง50-o, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to municipal liability for negligence
